snippet: People of means are scrambling to take advantage of the significant gift tax exemption which, for now, will expire on Dec. 31 with the rest of the Bush tax cuts.
abstract: People of means are scrambling to take advantage of the significant gift tax exemption which, for now, will expire at the end of 2012 with the rest of the Bush tax cuts.
